--- title: UQRUG 52 date: '2024-07-31' description: '**Overview**: Using taskscheduleR to automate scripts
' categories: meeting toc: true toc-depth: 5 --- ## 2024-05-29: UQRUG 50 ### R Overview of the Month #### Using taskscheduleR to automate your R scripts At UQRUG this month, we have an overview of the taskscheduleR package by Luke Gaiter. He will show showcase the usage of the [taskscheduleR](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/taskscheduleR/versions/1.8) package for automating the running of your scripts on a schedule. This is useful is you find yourself gathering data from a source that updates frequently. ### Attendees Add your name, where you're from, and why you're here: | Name | Where are you from? | What brings you here? | |-------------|---------------------|--------------------------| | Luke Gaiter | Library | Here to present and help | | | | | ### Questions
